com.bmc.arsys.apitransport.session

Class ApiThreadLocalStorageBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmc.arsys.apitransport.session.ApiThreadLocalStorageBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.bmc.arsys.arthreadlocal.ARThreadLocalStorable

    public class ApiThreadLocalStorageBlock
extends Object
implements com.bmc.arsys.arthreadlocal.ARThreadLocalStorable
    Thread local storage block to hold thread safe variables used by Java api. Some of the private variable in ARServerUser means to used only for current thread causing ARServerUser not thread safe. We should move them here. To register: ApiThreadLocalStorageBlock.registerTLB(tlb); or ApiThreadLocalStorageBlock.createTLB() will create a tlb and register it To use it: ApiThreadLocalStorageBlock.getTLB().setXXX(); ApiThreadLocalStorageBlock.getTLB().getXXX();
